extendedInfo.description: Transfer files between your Android and computer wirelessly. Works over 3G/4G/Wifi. No login required. Works with any file type.To use EZ Drop:1. To get your PIN, go to http://ez.dropper.co on your PC2. To connect your PC and android device, type your PIN into the app3. To transfer files to your device, select files in your  browser. To transfer files to your PC, select files in the app.=================What are the requirements to run EZ Drop?EZ Drop should be compatible with most Android devices running Android 1.6 or later (4.0 should work, but it may not look ICSish). The website should be compatible with most modern web browsers, including Chrome 12 or later, Firefox 3.6 or later, Safari 5.0 or later (For best performance IE is not recommended).=================I appreciate your support helping to spread and improve EZ Drop.Should you have any issue before you rate EZ Drop below 5 stars, please kindly mail me at president@nanch.com to give me an opportunity to provide you with assistance in resolving your issue!Thank you and enjoy EZ Drop!Keywords:file transfer, wireless transfer, wireless sync

reviews.title: Seriously good app!
reviews.comment: This is is sooooo convenient and easy to use. No sign ups or registration needed. No software to download and install on PC... just need to use Firefox or chrome (no IE). Galaxy Nexus.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wonderful
reviews.comment: Performs very well on the Galaxy Nexus. Lovely little app. Would feel a little more comfortable with a better privacy policy.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.comment: Wow! That\'s super cool & it really works! Simply it pushes the files you\'ve selected from their site like push-notifications! Samsung Galaxy S II - CM 9  Well done developers! Hats-Up to you!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: I came across this on reddit, I believe. I decided to give it a  try and I have to say, I love it!!! Much appreciation goes out to the dev. Great job! 10 stars! (I wish)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Droid 2 Global with Gingerbread over 3G: 12 MP3\'s (99.1 MB) took less than 10 minutes to copy, very easy to use.  Problem: I told it to copy 13 MP3\'s and it \"forgot\" one. So double-check your files are there before you count on them, but everything the app said copied was there.  I love the app and the idea, one bug and a couple UI tweaks and this will be a solid 5 stars and one of my \"must-have\" apps.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best Transfer
reviews.comment: I tried over 20 transfer apps but this one is the easiest. As long as ya have wifi connection it works like a charm. Get it while it\'s free - for it\'s worth $2.99. Highly recommend. Kudos!
reviews.author: Edward Aiz

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: Great convenient app.  Only feature I could request is a thumbnail view of the file being selected on the phone to transfer.  Thanks to the Dev for the awesome application.
reviews.author: MATTHEW VALERI

reviews.title: Nexus 4
reviews.comment: App crashes when you select multiple files. E mailed the developer and he said \" well it works for me \".. Useless app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!!
reviews.comment: Of all apps ive tried, ive tried quite a few, this is no doubt the BEST APP so far!!!!  I wasted alot of time on other file transfer apps and usb chords.  With Ez dropper i could not believe how quick and EZ transferring files between pc and mobile went!  I Love It!!!  Thank you very much Nanch!!!!
reviews.author: Ginny Williams

reviews.title: It works, but with some hassle
reviews.comment: It gets the job done, but how come there isn\'t an option to sync files to one android device to another device? Why does it have to be on PC? It is just a hassle to open up the browser from a android device. Another thing, no tablet mode. -_-
reviews.author: Matoro Zeliph

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: Great app! Works even with transferring files from my Transformer to my Phone! Extremely fast!
reviews.author: A Google User
